visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar area chart with stacked data in percentage format. The chart should have a title, styled axes and labels, and specific data series. Additionally, specify custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins and background.

title.text: Polar Area Chart with Percentage Stacking

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a polar area chart with stacked data in percentage format. The chart type is set to 'area' with 'polar' set to true, which creates a circular chart. The title of the chart is styled with a specific color, font size, and weight. The axes labels and titles are also styled with custom colors and font sizes. The data series are defined with specific data points and names, and custom colors are applied to the series. Additional configurations include enabling the legend with specific alignment and styling, disabling credits, and enabling exporting options for the chart.
